refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: gok_gconf_get_int ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the requested key and stores it in the given dest. If an error occurs during retreiving the key a message is logged using gok_log_x and dest is left unchanged.

listitem.simpara: GConfClient to use to retreive the key.
GConf key to retrieve.
Pointer to a gint to store the retrieved key, if successful.
TRUE if key retrieved successfully, FALSE if an error occured.

refsect2.title: gok_gconf_set_int ()
refsect2.para: Stores the given (key, value) pair if it is different from what is in GConf already. If an error occurs during storing the key a message is logged using gok_log_x.

listitem.simpara: GConfClient to use to set the value.
GConf key to set.
gint to store.
TRUE if key stored successfully, FALSE if an error occured.

refsect2.title: gok_gconf_get_bool ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the requested key and stores it in the given dest. If an error occurs during retreiving the key a message is logged using gok_log_x and dest is left unchanged.

listitem.simpara: GConfClient to use to retreive the key.
GConf key to retrieve.
Pointer to a gboolean to store the retrieved key, if successful.
TRUE if key retrieved successfully, FALSE if an error occured.

refsect2.title: gok_gconf_set_bool ()
refsect2.para: Stores the given (key, value) pair if it is different from what is in GConf already. If an error occurs during storing the key a message is logged using gok_log_x.

listitem.simpara: GConfClient to use to set the value.
GConf key to set.
gboolean to store.
TRUE if key stored successfully, FALSE if an error occured.

refsect2.title: gok_gconf_get_string ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the requested key and stores it in the given dest. If an error occurs during retreiving the key a message is logged using gok_log_x and dest is left unchanged.
NOTE: *dest needs to be freed when finished with.

listitem.simpara: GConfClient to use to retreive the key.
GConf key to retrieve.
Pointer to a pointer to a gchar to store the retrieved key, if successful.
TRUE if key retrieved successfully, FALSE if an error occured.

refsect2.title: gok_gconf_set_string ()
refsect2.para: Stores the given (key, value) pair if it is different from what is in GConf already. If an error occurs during storing the key a message is logged using gok_log_x.

listitem.simpara: GConfClient to use to set the value.
GConf key to set.
gchar to store.
TRUE if key stored successfully, FALSE if an error occured.
